question: Hi my name is Odi and I had Lymphoma B Cell level 4 my treatment was Chop-R Chemotherapy 8 treatments.During the course of the treatment one of my doctors discovered that I developed Non alcohol Fatty liver, I had never had diabetes or being overweight but during my Chemo I gain 30 pounds and they believed that it was because I also have Polycythemia Vera and they explained that 1% of people that get chemo gain weight very rare and lucky I guess because most of my dear friends from the hospital in the cancer unit were very thin and sick.Now that the chemo is gone my liver is having problems with that fat and I have always being a very healthy person until all this started organic this and that??? please help me besides trying to lose weight what kind of diet or what should I eat and what shouldn't and can you tell me if that happens often to people that have chemo.Thank you
